channel.title: Photos on Jon Zlotnik

item.title: Bees on Ile-Bizard
item.description: Avi and I took a walk along the Parc Ile-Bizard trails. My 55mm Nikkor Micro f/2.8 was attached when we fell upon a field of buzzing white flowers. The goals were to get (1) a bee drinking with its tongue out, (2) a pollen bulge, and (3) a bumblebee.
